text:
SPDR ®SERIES TRUST

SPDR Bloomberg 1-3Month T-BillETF

SPDR Bloomberg 3-12Month T-BillETF

(each, a Fund and collectively, the Funds)

Supplement dated October 11, 2023

to the Prospectus, Summary Prospectuses and
Statement of Additional Information (the
SAI),

each dated October 31, 2022, as may be
supplemented from time to time

Effective immediately, April Borawski no
longer serves as a Portfolio Manager of the
Funds. Accordingly, effective immediately, all
references to April
Borawski in the Prospectus, Summary
Prospectuses and SAI are deleted in their
entirety. As of the date of this Supplement,
the remaining Portfolio Managers of each Fund
continue to serve in such roles.

PLEASE RETAIN THIS SUPPLEMENT FOR FUTURE
REFERENCE

101123SUPP1
